item.title: Server Communicating With Webhost Via Mysql
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:511494”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=629739.msg4271152#msg4271152 date=1364532441]

The first important thing is
Does your webhost allow remote connections?

Ah, I found out that it does not. Thanks for asking that question.
[/quote]
It’s the #1 thing I notice is wrong with Vote4Cash’s, Highscores, and auto donation systems.
I use WAMP for it.[/quote]
For WAMP, what host address would I use for the files that are uploaded to my webhost?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Communicating With Webhost Via Mysql
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:511494”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=629739.msg4271144#msg4271144 date=1364531958]
For the webhost url, what do I put there? The actual site IP? By default, it was set to localhost.
[/quote]
The domain of the site that the sql server is hosted at.

As seen by the error, your server isn’t accepting your packets, probably something wrong with verification. If the webhost url was set to localhost, set it to the url to what I said above, then try it.[/quote]
It might be the site not allowing connection.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Communicating With Webhost Via Mysql

item.title: Server Communicating With Webhost Via Mysql
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

For the webhost url, what do I put there? The actual site IP? By default, it was set to localhost.

The domain of the site that the sql server is hosted at.

As seen by the error, your server isn’t accepting your packets, probably something wrong with verification. If the webhost url was set to localhost, set it to the url to what I said above, then try it.

Read full topic
